rescheduled.subject: Booking Rescheduled: {service_type}
rescheduled.body:
Hi,

Your booking for {service_type} has been rescheduled.

New Date: {date}

Booking ID: {booking_id}

Notes: {notes}

Thanks,
Ayuja Support Team

cancelled.subject: Booking Cancelled: {service_type}
cancelled.body:
Hi,

Unfortunately, your booking for {service_type} has been cancelled.

Booking ID: {booking_id}

Notes: {notes}

Please contact support for more details.

Thanks,
Ayuja Support Team

status_update.subject: Booking Status Updated: {service_type} - {status}
status_update.body:
Hi,

Your booking for {service_type} scheduled on {date} has been updated to {status}.

Booking ID: {booking_id}

Notes: {notes}

Thanks,
Ayuja Support Team
